remarks: Implicit substitution of classes for setvar variables.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-1995.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)
statement:
vtocl3.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
vtocl3.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
vtocl3.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
vtocl3.4 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B /\ z = C ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
vtocl3.5 $e |- ph $.
vtocl3 $p |- ps $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d ps x y z $.
